channel.title: Scottsdale, AZ Web Designer and Developer
channel.description: I am a web designer and developer located in Scottsdale, Arizona. I have 14 years experience working with marketing, advertising and interactive design agencies

item.title: Plexus Worldwide Digital Redesign and Rebranding
item.description: Role UI/UX Designer Company Plexus Worldwide LLC Industry Multi-Level Marketing Project Deliverables Design System, Ecommerce Storeâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Role UI/UX Designer
Company Plexus Worldwide LLC
Industry Multi-Level Marketing
Project Deliverables Design System, Ecommerce Store, Replicated Site Builder, Admin Dashboard, Email Templating, Digital Branding, Marketing Landing Pages, Contest Web Applications, Custom Zendesk Theme, Custom Sharepoint Theme
Tools/Technology Angular, Node.js, Bootstrap, Metalsmith, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Sketch, Abstract, Adobe Creative Suite

As the first digital designer hired to the marketing team, I lead 3 consecutive redesigns of plexusworldwide.com. This includes a custom ecommerce store, ambassador replicated site builder, back office dashboard and marketing landing pages.

I helped develop an atomic design system in both Sketch and Angular components based on feedback from A/B user testing, cognitive walkthroughs and data analysis. I have also designed and developed landing pages, contest web applications, auto responder email templating systems, ZenDesk and Sharepoint theming, Custom Wordpress themes and plugins.
